lead_paragraph: Australian show jumper Scott Keach will not be alone in competing in his second Olympics in Rio later this year but it is unlikely anyone else in the Athletes' Village will have waited so long for another taste of the Games.

headline.print_headline: Show Jumper Keach Returns to Games 28 Years Later
headline.main: Show Jumper Keach Returns to Games 28 Years Later

snippet: Australian show jumper Scott Keach will not be alone in competing in his second Olympics in Rio later this year but it is unlikely anyone else in the Athletes' Village will have waited so long for another taste of the Games....
